itemDescription: British art curator; daughter of Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall

wikipedia_page.main: Laura Rose Lopes (née Parker Bowles; born 1978) is an English art curator. She is the daughter of Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, and Andrew Parker Bowles, and the stepdaughter of Charles, Prince of Wales.

response: He is a great-grandson of author W. Somerset Maugham and great-great-grandson of Thomas John Barnardo. His stepmother is Susan Rose "Sukie" Phipps (born 1941), who was brought up by Fitzroy Maclean, one of the models for James Bond."Derek Paravicini, the Parker Bowles prodigy", Timesonline.co.uk, 28 February 2008. His cousins include food writer Tom Parker Bowles and his sister Laura Lopes."Derek Paravicini, the Parker Bowles prodigy", The Times. 28 February 2008
Parker Bowles is the son of Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, and Andrew Parker Bowles. His stepfather and godfather is Charles, Prince of Wales. He has one younger sister, Laura Lopes.
*Laura Lopes (born 1978), daughter of Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall and Andrew Parker Bowles, OBE

link_mentions.page: List of wedding guests of Prince William and Catherine Middleton
response: * Eliza Lopes, aged 3 – daughter of Harry Lopes and Laura Lopes (born Laura Rose Parker Bowles), and granddaughter of Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall
*Filipe Costa and Mateus Sá — Abaporu (Laura Lopes)
